reviews.review_msg: (Actually MATH426). Dr. Tupper's kind & humble. It's important to him that students understand concepts, so he welcomes questions & pauses lectures to make clarifications before moving on. He allowed us to allocate more percentage towards our project over our final if we wished. Homework was sometimes tricky, but office hours helped immensely.

It was a real adventure in Math. Dr. Tupper was most helpful, kind and patient. Lectures were very clear. I am not sure if I could manage the book without Dr. Tupper's lectures. High quality teaching. Well done, Dr. Tupper!
Malicious marker. I would highly not recommend taking courses with him. Did not learn much.

Fantastic professor. VERY organized. Very clear on grading scheme. Gives a full list of what to know/memorize for the final, which I studied and did very well on the final. Would absolutely take a class with him again. Very thick Chinese accent though.
